ygData.subject: Re: The specialize skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like the general concensus is going to be that alteration is the way to go... that was pretty much the conclusion I had come to myself, but I wanted to
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like the general concensus is going to be that alteration is the way to go... that was pretty much the conclusion I had come to myself, but I wanted to hear what other clerics who had specialization thought about it from experience...

Thanks =)

-Eachann Bronzeleaf,
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr

----- Original Message -----
From: Pam <adira399@...>
To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, November 19, 1999 2:44 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] The specialize skill


> From: Pam <adira399@...>
>
> Well, I put points into all of them, just one tho. I
> then kept casting light healing/healing on newbies
> near my town till my alteration hit 51! That was it.
>
> I realize that abjuration is probably the most used
> due to all the buffing, but alteration is the most
> critical to a cleric! I would rather run out of mana
> while buffing than while healing.
>
> Then again, i guess it all depends on how you want to
> do it, this is just my personal opinion
>
> Adira SoulSaver
>
> --- Jeff Portwine <jdport@...> wrote:
>
> <HR>
> <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0
> Transitional//EN">
> <HTML><HEAD>
> <META content="text/html; charset=iso-8859-1"
> http-equiv=Content-Type>
> <META content="MSHTML 5.00.2014.210" name=GENERATOR>
> <STYLE></STYLE>
> </HEAD>
> <BODY bgColor=#ffffff>
> <DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>A question for all you
> level 50 clerics, or at
> least clerics above level 30...  what is the best
> school of magic to
> specialize in?   My initial thought is that
> I would want to specialize
> in alteration since that is the school that the
> healing spells are in and I
> think I use the healing spells more than any
> other...  Somebody else
> suggested that I put one practice point into each
> school and just go with
> whichever one increases over 50 first... the theory
> being that whichever one
> goes over 50 first is probably the one I use the
> most.   Does anybody
> else have any ideas reguarding which school is best to
> specialize
> in?</FONT></DIV>
> <DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>I am level 29, about half
> way to 30... so I will
> soon be facing this choice.  Thanks!</FONT></DIV>
> <DIV> </DIV>
> <DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>-Eachann
> Bronzeleaf</FONT></DIV>
> <DIV><FONT face=Arial size=2>-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew
> Marr</FONT></DIV></BODY></HTML>
>
>
> <HR>
> <html>
> >
